author: Bethesda Softworks
description:
Indiana Jones and the Great Circle™ is coming to Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026! Learn more and wishlist now.

Uncover one of history’s greatest mysteries in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, a first-person, single-player adventure set between the events of Raiders of the Lost Ark™ and The Last Crusade™. Awarded D.I.C.E “Adventure Game of the Year” and featured in over 50 ""Best of"" and ""Game of the Year"" lists in 2024, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle delivers an immersive experience that allows you to step into the boots of the renowned archaeologist. 

ESRB RATING: Teen with Violence, Blood and gore, Mild language, Drug reference
title: Nintendo Switch 2™ Reveal - Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

author: Bethesda Softworks
description:
An all-new story chapter launches soon on September 4! Mysteries of the Roman empire await Indiana Jones, where forgotten catacombs twist into something far more sinister. 

There is a myth of a beast in the hidden depths of Rome, rumored to guard a terrible secret... When Indiana Jones encounters Father Ricci, a young priest desperate for help to track down a Roman artifact, a standard treasure hunt soon turns into a perilous journey. Along the way Indy must face the sinister plots of Emperor Nero and his gladiator games, the enigmatic Cult of Mithras, and whatever else lurks in the shadows. Can Father Ricci's cryptic knowledge guide Indy through these treacherous passageways? Only Indiana Jones can piece together this breathtaking mystery. 

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle™: The Order of Giants is available September 4, 2025! Buy the Premium Edition now or upgrade to gain access at launch: https://indianajones.bethesda.net/buy-now (Also available for purchase separately from Sept
title: Launch Trailer – Indiana Jones and the Great Circle™: The Order of Giants
